Articles.Content:
-Thoroughly explore Claira's gorgeous interiors.

Might want to reword that.

-Gawk over load times (Install an absolute truckload of mods I've been forgoing due to RAM issues.

-Pretty much just play the game.

Oh yeah, that'll be me for sure.
Slap a flag on the MÃƒÂ¼n, then use flag planting as an incentive to finally send manned missions to Minmus and Duna. Those manned missions will definitely be rovers with seats on them.
Plant A Flag On Gilly, Maybe Somehow Cheat And Plant A Flag On The Sun Kerbol

After trying to land on the runway, I think what i'll actually end up doing first is planting loads of flags as runway approach markers.

Also, I tried posting here yesterday, but my post has not been approved yet (had to re-register after the Great Crash). If this ends up as a double post then I apologise for that in advance.
I think what ill do is WAIT! lol ill watch a few youtube videos and read the forums for a couple of days to see if any of the mods go crazy. And then proceed ....
Search for Easter eggs.
First i copy my saves, ships, and subassembly loader and Kerbal alarm clock to .20, then i open the save and plant flags wherever i have kerbals. Then i gawk at the new parts and IVAs.
I'll build a number of descent ships and send them to the Jool system for thorough exploration. I'm a regular player of this game but never set foot on Tylo, Bop and Pol.

-Thoroughly explore Claira's gorgeous interiors.

.

...facepalm
Guys, You all forgot what we will ALL be doing when 0.2 comes out, Spamming F5, or cmd + R, while Jeb roasts marshmallows over the Kerbal Space Program Server!

I think I'm the only one who didn't forget about the cool new set of rover wheels we are getting that look modern. I wish we still had the picture of them. I think they are gone because of the forum collapse.

ANYWAYS, I'm going to use those and a chair to make an ATV!

I'm surprised. I used to check the forums while on my phone when out of town on weekends. I've done that twice to find an update had been released.

Updates have been released on fridays/weekends, that's how they know it always ends bad.
Remember guys, reaction images aren't permitted on the Forums. We're not an image board.

I'll probably just go back to being able to have 1000+ parts in mods again.

Dang RAM issues...
i wish they would give a few of the most popular mods, we really need simple things like hinges and pistons for increment positions.
The first thing I will do is build a huge ship and do a tour of the Jool system.
Two words; Space Chair. I'm going to strap an ion engine and a xenon tank to the bottom of a seat, add some power and fly that puppy to Duna. I'm sure the pilot will land just fine.
I think I'm going to make a drop pod system for kerbals, ODEK (Orbital-Drop-Exploration-Kerbals) using seats and new parts, I cannae wait for new parts...
Plant a flag at the south pole. Put some chairs out. And have a barbecue at the bottom of the world.
Putting a flag somewhere on Mun.
Send a Cupola to my space station

Take everything off and reinstall everything I would think. Then put my flag on the Mun.

After that probably stop playing the game until it gets a more decent set of updates, I am practically at the point now (180+ hours) where I want to ditch it for a few months and go play something else and I dont think a few seats and flags are going to make any difference to that , but lets see what comes along in the patch first.

I may possibly mess around with a Mun lifter design as that would be cool. But I really dont like the way that the Kerbals are massive in this game and to do a rover with Kerbals sat in it would need to be really oversized and look stupid sat on top of a rocket to get it to the Mun. I play this game as realistically as possible so I dont make unfeasibly massive rovers/bases/stations etc sat on top of rockets. I hate that.

Edited May 20, 2013 by nats
Find out how many seats fit on a large SRB so more than just Jeb gets the first go. Bill and Bob can't miss out.

Plant a flag at the south pole. Put some chairs out. And have a barbecue at the bottom of the world.

Im gonna put 4 Kerbals in chairs by the launchpad and re-enact Monty Python's 4 Yorkshiremen skit.
Make an epic flag that will bee seen from space, do some experiments with the new seat modules and see how its made
